name: Samsung 32 inch LED Smart TV (Color)
description: This HD TV features a 1366 x 768 resolution with a 50Hz refresh rate for clear everyday viewing. It offers diverse connectivity including Wi-Fi 5 for smooth streaming, Bluetooth for wireless audio, 2 HDMI ports (one with eARC) for set-top boxes and soundbars, USB-A for media playback, Ethernet for stable internet, Anynet+ (HDMI-CEC) for unified device control, and RF In for cable or antenna input. The 20W sound system includes Object Tracking Sound Lite, Q-Symphony, and Adaptive Sound for immersive audio. Smart features comprise a voice-assisted smart remote, Alexa and Google Assistant compatibility via external speakers, Samsung TV Plus with 100+ free channels, web browser, mobile-to-TV mirroring, AirPlay support, and a universal guide. Picture quality is enhanced by the Hyper Real Picture Engine, HDR10+, PurColor, Contrast Enhancer, and Micro Dimming Pro. It has a 3-star energy rating with 39 kWh annual consumption.

name: Samsung 43 inch LED Smart TV (Color)
description: This Full HD TV offers a resolution of 1920 x 1080 with a 50Hz refresh rate for clear, smooth visuals. Connectivity options include Wi-Fi 5 for streaming, Bluetooth for wireless audio, 2 HDMI ports (one with eARC) for set-top boxes and soundbars, USB-A for media playback, Ethernet for stable internet, Anynet+ (HDMI-CEC) for device control, and RF In for cable or antenna. The 20W sound system features Object Tracking Sound Lite, Q-Symphony, and Adaptive Sound for immersive audio. Smart features include a voice-assisted remote, Alexa and Google Assistant compatibility via external speakers, Samsung TV Plus with 100+ free channels, web browser, mobile mirroring, AirPlay support, and a universal guide. Powered by the Hyper Real Picture Engine, HDR10+, PurColor, Contrast Enhancer, and Micro Dimming Pro enhance picture quality. It has a 5-star energy rating with 45 kWh annual consumption.

name: Croma - A Tata Product 32 inch LED Smart TV (Color)
Croma - A Tata Product 43 inch LED Smart TV (Color)
Sony 43 inch LED Smart TV (Color)
description: The Sony BRAVIA 2 II 4K Ultra HD LED TV delivers stunning visuals with a 3840 x 2160 resolution and 60Hz refresh rate. It features 4 HDMI and 2 USB ports for connecting set-top boxes, Blu-ray players, or gaming consoles. With 20W sound output and support for DTS Digital Surround, DTS:X, Dolby Atmos, and Dolby Audio, it ensures immersive audio through dual full-range open baffle speakers. The smart TV runs on Google TV and includes features like Chromecast built-in, Google Assistant, Apple AirPlay 2, HomeKit, Alexa, Game Menu, and HDMI 2.1 compatibility (ALLM/eARC). Powered by the 4K Processor X1, it offers vivid visuals with Live Color, 4K X-Reality PRO, MotionFlow XR 200, and HDR10/HLG. A 1-year comprehensive warranty is included.

name: Sony 65 inch LED Smart TV (Color)
description:
Resolution: 4K Ultra HD (3840 x 2160) | Refresh Rate: 60 hertz | BRAVIA 3 LED
Connectivity: 4 HDMI ports to connect set top box, Blu Ray players, gaming console | 2 USB ports to connect hard drives and other USB devices

Smart TV Features: Google TV | Watchlist | Google Assistant | Chromecast Built In | Built In Mic |Game menu | ALLM/eARC (HDMI 2.1 Compatible) | Additional Features: Apple Airplay | Apple Homekit | Alexa
Display : 4K LED | 4K HDR Processor X1 | Triluminos PRO | 4K X-Reality PRO | MotionFlow XR 200 | HDR10/HLG, Dolby Vision
Warranty Information: 1 year comprehensive warranty on product provided by the brand from the date of purchase
